DataElement.preferredDefinition: The end date of study treatment represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Domain End Date

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the [intended/actual
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the [intended/actual] [study treatment/dose] [end] date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH PROMPT
ReferenceDocuments.description: [End] Date

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the end date of the study treatment administration using this format( DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECENDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH END DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable ECENDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date when study treatment period stopped. If start date and end date are not expected to be on the same date, the collection of the end date is required. If the study design indicates that the start and end date are on the same day, the collection of the end date is not required since it can be assigned to be equal to the start date.

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 12/12/23 Added alt OID for CCTG ticket number CADSR0003182 cjl; 2023.11.16 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0003083. ak 2023.6.29 Alt SN added per ticket request CADSR0002564. ak 2023.5.24 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002454. ak 2023.3.17 AQTs added per ticket request CADSR0002164. ak 2023.2.1 Alt SN added per ticket request CADSR0001995 and CADSR0002006 . ak 1/17/2023: added alt short name and AQT per cadrs0001921.wz 2023.1.4 Alt SNs/ AQT added per ticket request CADSR0001862. ak 10/20/22 added 1 alt name, 2 AQTs, 1 classification for the CTEP CDISC Harmonization project cjl;
